page.title: 01CATTERICK GARRISON
page.content: Our area covers{Catterick Garrison}and the village of{Scotton.}It is mainly a {Military}area but it also has many civilians.It has barracks,open spaces ,woodland,farmland and some derelict land.Residential areas are divided between private houses ,mainly situated in Scotton and Bying Road area;while other housing is mainly army quarters.The barracks are well spread out with lots of open spaces in between.There is a main Post Office and a few sub-post offices.There are shopping areas and cafes.We have a large fairly new {military hospital} also a health centre near camp centre. There is a golf course, ski club, saddle club,two sports stadiums ,military sporting facilities and a swimming pool.Two schools are in our area.A County Library serves the area.
